data.text:
Luis (Iñaki) Prádanos-Garcia

Originally from Spain, Professor Prádanos did his undergraduate work in Spain and Italy, and completed his M.A. and Ph.D. in the US. In his free time he enjoys designing a permaculture food forest in his yard, playing pickleball, as well as reading, cooking, dancing, and playing guitar.
